DataElement.preferredName: Person Intravenous Drug Abuse Personal Medical History Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to the personal medical history (the reporting of medical events) of intravenous (within a blood vessel) drug abuse (the use of a drug for a reason other than which it was intended or in a manner or in quantities other than directed) in a person._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Intravenous Drug Abuse Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the personal medical history (the reporting of medical events) of intravenous (within a blood vessel) drug abuse (the use of a drug for a reason other than which it was intended or in a manner or in quantities other than directed) in a person.

Property.preferredName: Intravenous Drug Abuse Personal Medical History
Property.preferredDefinition: (in-tra-VEE-nus) IV. Within a blood vessel.:The use of a drug for a reason other than which it was intended or in a manner or in quantities other than directed.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Into or within a vein. Intravenous usually refers to a way of giving a drug or other substance through a needle or tube inserted into a vein.
The use of a drug for a reason other than which it was intended or in a manner or in quantities other than directed.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ReferenceDocuments.name: This measure is a questionnai
ReferenceDocuments.description: This measure is a questionnaire to assess whether a respondent has ever used a needle to inject drugs not prescribed by a physician.
